issue.title: [Python] Construct pyarrow.DictionaryArray from boxed pyarrow array objects
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-752](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-752). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently `DictionaryArray.from_arrays` expect pandas-originated NumPy objects

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-752?focusedCommentId=15958901) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 496
